Question.QText: Which of the following is(are) compound word(s):
What is the decimal equivalent of binary '11000101'?
What is the full form of ATP?
What is the mean of the set: {11,12,13,14,15,16,17}?
Which of the following can help improve your health:
Question.Option: Sitting for more than hours at a time
Exercising for at least 30 minutes a day
Question.Answer: Limiting processed food intake,Limiting soda intake,Exercising for at least 30 minutes a day

Question.QText: What was the main cause(s) of the Great Depression in 1929?
Question.Option: Traders refrained from selling stocks for 4 days
Franking D. Roosevelt's passing of the New Deal program
A sudden decrease of shares going into the market
Traders sold 12.9 millions of shares of stock in one day
Question.Answer: Traders sold 12.9 millions of shares of stock in one day

Question.QText: Which subatomic particle is responsible for determining the type of element?
